hours_text:
__Return to[Your Visit](https://www.mariettahistory.org/your-visit)

#  Hours & Admissions 

#### **Marietta History Center Hours:** 10am to 4pm, Tuesdays through Saturdays. 

_(Closed Sundays, Mondays, Fourth of July, Thanksgiving Day, Friday after Thanksgiving, Christmas (Dec. 24 & 25), New Year’s Day.)_

**Admission starting at**(applicable taxes will be applied at time of purchase)

  * Adults-$10.00
  * Students-$7.00
  * Seniors (60+)-$7.00
  * Members & Children under 5 – Free
  * Active Military and Veterans – Free
  * Guided Tours (10 or more persons)-$10.00 

[Click here for Directions](https://www.mariettahistory.org/your-visit/directions "Directions")

**Permanent link to this article:** https://www.mariettahistory.org/your-visit/hours-admissions
